impact-statement: Daple is a guanine nucleotide-exchange factor (GEF) for trimeric G proteins that enables Wnt/Frizzled receptors to transactivate G proteins during non-canonical Wnt signaling.

contribution.con1: NA, Designed, performed and analyzed most of the experiments in this work. Wrote the manuscript, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data, Drafting or revising the article
contribution.con2: KKM, Carried out all assays involving FRET imaging, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data
contribution.con3: YD, Performed all the qPCR analyses, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data
contribution.con4: IL-S, Carried out the RIA assays for cAMP measurement, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data
contribution.con5: YP, Cloned Daple and generated mutants used in this work, Contributed unpublished essential data or reagents
contribution.con6: AM, Designed and performed the in vitro assays investigating Daple-G protein interaction and activation of G protein in vitro, and carried out the protein sequence analyses, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data
contribution.con7: JB, Carried out the CTC analyses, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data
contribution.con8: FM, Carried out the RIA assays for cAMP measurement, Conception and design, Analysis and interpretation of data
contribution.con9: UN, Provided access to tumor samples used in this work, Contributed unpublished essential data or reagents
contribution.con12: AG, Provided access to adenomas, Contributed unpublished essential data or reagents
contribution.con13: MA, Carried out the CTC analyses, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data
contribution.con10: K-PJ, Provided access to tumor samples used in this work, Contributed unpublished essential data or reagents
contribution.con11: KW, An expert in stem cell biology and Wnt signaling provided us with high quality and high purity recombinant Wnt3 and Wnt5 ligand that we used in several assays during the revisions. These reagents were produced and purified by us in collaboration with him in his laboratory and using his resources using large cultures of CHO cells using previously published protocols from his laboratory, Contributed unpublished essential data or reagents
contribution.con14: MG-M, Designed and performed the in vitro assays investigating Daple-G protein interaction and activation of G protein in vitro, and carried out the protein sequence analyses. Generated the Daple-Gαi3 homology model. Wrote the manuscript, conceived and supervised the project, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data, Drafting or revising the article
contribution.con15: PG, Designed, performed and analyzed most of the experiments in this work. Wrote the manuscript, conceived and supervised the project, and funded the project, Conception and design, Acquisition of data, Analysis and interpretation of data, Drafting or revising the article
